item.title: 为濒临破产的企业提供贷款，中国影子银行重回聚光灯下
item.description: 中国对地方政府借贷的打压迫使一些最富裕省份的国有实体从非银行贷款机构获取成本高昂的信贷，这种权宜之计正在金融体系不透明的角落里积聚风险。【原文：China’s crackdown on borrowing by local governments is forcing state-run entities in even some of the wealthiest provinces to tap costly credit from non-bank lenders, a stopgap that’s building up risks in an opaque corner of the financial system.】

item.title: DocuSign 第三季度业绩超出预期，前景不容乐观
item.description: DocuSign 公司的人工智能 IAM 平台帮助这家电子签名平台提供商的第三季度业绩超出预期，但由于本季度业绩展望未超出分析师预期，该公司股价下滑。【原文：DocuSign Inc.’s AI-powered IAM platform helped the electronic-signature platform provider’s third-quarter results beat estimates, though its shares slipped as its outlook for the current quarter didn’t exceed analysts’ expectations.】

item.title: 哈塞特称美联储应降息，预测为 25 个基点
item.description: 美国国家经济委员会主任凯文-哈塞特（Kevin Hassett）表示，美联储应在下周的会议上降息，并预测降息幅度为25个基点，因为人们越来越多地猜测，唐纳德-特朗普总统正在准备提名他领导美联储。【原文：National Economic Council Director Kevin Hassett said the Federal Reserve should cut interest rates at its meeting next week and predicted a reduction of 25 basis points as speculation grows that President Donald Trump is readying his nomination to lead the central bank.】

item.title: OpenAI 和 NextDC 计划在悉尼建设大型数据中心
item.description: 澳大利亚数据中心集团 NextDC Ltd. 和 ChatGPT 开发商 OpenAI 已同意合作在悉尼开发一个大型数据中心。【原文：Australian data center group NextDC Ltd. and ChatGPT-developer OpenAI have agreed to partner on the development of a large-scale data center in Sydney.】

item.title: 专营 6.4 万美元日本游的旅行社瞄准 IPO
item.description: 即使是超级富豪，似乎也越来越需要帮助来预订日本的豪华假期。【原文：Even the super-rich appear to be in growing need of help to book opulent vacations in Japan.】

item.title: 日本寿险公司继续对冲日元升值接近 13 年低点的风险
item.description: 根据彭博社对财报的分析，在截至 9 月底的上半财年中，日本寿险公司对冲日元升值风险的力度接近 13 年来的最低点。【原文：Japan’s life insurers left their hedging against the risk of a stronger yen near a 13-year low in the fiscal first half through end-September, according to a Bloomberg analysis of earnings reports.】

item.title: 亚洲市场谨慎开盘，美国股市踯躅不前：市场综述
item.description: 亚洲股市开盘涨跌不一，因为华尔街今天表现不佳，拖累了科技股和债券，并阻止了比特币在下周美联储决议前的反弹。【原文：Asian equities were set for a mixed start as a lackluster day on Wall Street weighed on tech stocks and bonds and halted a rebound in Bitcoin ahead of next week’s Federal Reserve decision.】

item.title: 人工智能股票交易大变革推动亚洲寻找新星
item.description: 随着技术变革和对泡沫的担忧重塑了投资领域，人们开始从人工智能行业中寻找新的亚洲股票赢家。【原文：The hunt is on for new Asian equity winners from the artificial intelligence trade, as a technological shift and bubble fears reshape the investment universe.】

item.title: 数字支付兴起，美联储考虑改变支票服务
item.description: 美联储正在就潜在的支票服务变化征求意见，因为该央行正在权衡对其支票基础设施的大量投资。【原文：The Federal Reserve is seeking input on potential check service changes, as the central bank weighs substantial investments in its check infrastructure.】

item.title: 英国新足球监管机构下周开始打击不良业主
item.description: 英格兰新的独立足球监管机构首席执行官理查德-蒙克斯（Richard Monks）表示，他准备立即对不合适的所有者采取行动，并打击金融工程。【原文：The chief executive of England’s new independent football regulator, Richard Monks, said he is prepared to immediately take action against unsuitable owners and crack down on financial engineering.】

item.title: 苹果在最新人事变动中启用元律师担任总法律顾问
item.description: 苹果公司聘请 Meta Platforms Inc.首席法务官珍妮弗-纽斯特德（Jennifer Newstead）担任总法律顾问，这是这家 iPhone 制造商高管变动浪潮的一部分。【原文：Apple Inc. hired Meta Platforms Inc. Chief Legal Officer Jennifer Newstead as its general counsel, part of a wave of executive changes at the iPhone maker.】

item.title: SoFi Technologies 寻求通过出售股份融资 15 亿美元
item.description: SoFi Technologies Inc.正寻求通过出售股份融资 15 亿美元，因为这家金融科技公司的业务范围已从贷款扩展到其他产品。【原文：SoFi Technologies Inc. is seeking to raise $1.5 billion in a share sale, as the financial technology firm diversifies beyond lending into other products.】

item.title: 数据中心初创企业 Fluidstack 正洽谈 70 亿美元估值事宜
item.description: 据一位熟悉情况的人士透露，云计算初创公司 Fluidstack 正在洽谈一轮约 7 亿美元的融资，该轮融资将使公司估值达到 70 亿美元。【原文：The cloud-computing startup Fluidstack is in talks to raise roughly $700 million in a funding round that would value the company at $7 billion, according to a person familiar with the situation.】

item.title: Blackstone 牵头为安大略省教师 Mitratech 提供 20 亿美元贷款
item.description: 据知情人士透露，以 Blackstone Inc. 为首的私人信贷公司将提供超过 20 亿美元的资金，帮助软件制造商 Mitratech 为一揽子银行贷款进行再融资。【原文：Private credit firms led by Blackstone Inc. are supplying more than $2 billion to help software maker Mitratech refinance a bank loan package, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 繁忙之年，加拿大大型贷款机构的银行家奖金池增长 15
item.description: 在 2025 财年，加拿大最大的贷款机构为银行家的奖金池多预留了 15%的资金，这一年，这些公司的资本市场部门在交易上更加活跃，美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的政策波动也让交易柜台忙得不可开交。【原文：Canada’s biggest lenders set aside 15% more for banker bonus pools in fiscal 2025, a year when the firms’ capital-markets divisions were more active on deals and US President Donald Trump’s policy swings kept trading desks busy.】

item.title: 韩国年轻人放弃房主梦，扎堆投资飙升的股票
item.description: 随着韩国人从过热的房地产市场中撤退，他们正以创纪录的速度涌入股票市场；这一转变凸显了政策制定者为降低房价和缓解人们对负担能力的不满所做的努力。【原文：South Koreans are piling into equities at a record pace as they retreat from an overheating housing market — a shift that’s underscoring policymakers’ struggle to cool housing prices and ease discontent over affordability.】

item.title: 纽约市市长埃里克-亚当斯发布命令禁止以色列撤资
item.description: 纽约市市长埃里克-亚当斯（Eric Adams）的办公室表示，在佐赫兰-马姆达尼（Zohran Mamdani）就任前几周，他发布了两项行政命令，旨在解决反犹太主义问题。【原文：New York City Mayor Eric Adams issued a pair of executive orders aimed at addressing antisemitism, his office said, weeks before Zohran Mamdani takes his place.】

item.title: 巴西旨在将对邮政服务的援助排除在财政规则之外
item.description: 作为帮助面临严重财政危机的巴西邮政服务计划的一部分，巴西经济团队将能够从明年的财政目标中剔除 100 亿雷亚尔（18 亿美元）。【原文：Brazil’s economic team will be able to exclude 10 billion reais ($1.8 billion) from next year’s fiscal target as part of a plan to help the country’s postal service that’s facing a serious financial crisis.】

item.title: 高盛和凯雷将在 Willow 上提供 10,000 美元的私人基金使用权
item.description: 另类投资平台 Willow Wealth Inc. 与凯雷集团（Carlyle Group Inc.【原文：Alternative investment platform Willow Wealth Inc. struck a deal with Carlyle Group Inc., Goldman Sachs Group Inc. and StepStone Group to offer access to private credit funds for as little as $10,000, one of the lower entry points into the asset class.】

item.title: 未偿还国债突破 30 万亿美元，自 2018 年以来翻了一番
item.description: 美国政府的国债首次突破 30 万亿美元— 自 2018 年以来，随着大流行病时期借贷激增的影响，美国政府的国债增加了一倍多。【原文：US government debt in Treasuries topped $30 trillion for the first time — having more than doubled since 2018 as the pandemic-era borrowing surge takes its toll.】

item.title: 简街交易额因押注人类学公司而大幅增长
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，简街集团今年创下的记录得益于对人工智能热潮的精明押注，这在其交易业绩中表现为巨大的收益。【原文：Jane Street Group’s record haul this year has been boosted by savvy bets on the artificial intelligence boom that are showing up as big gains in its trading results, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 富国银行增聘重要前端交易员，发展市场业务
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，富国银行从德意志银行（Deutsche Bank AG）聘用了两名短期交易员，这是在美联储今年早些时候取消了对该银行的资产上限后，富国银行努力拓展市场业务的一部分。【原文：Wells Fargo & Co. hired two short-duration traders from Deutsche Bank AG, part of efforts to expand its markets business after the Federal Reserve lifted an asset cap on the bank earlier this year, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 高盛支持的巴西数据中心探索供电方案
item.description: 巴西最大的公用事业公司正在探索各种方案，以保证一个价值 500 亿美元的数据中心项目的电力供应，该项目旨在使里约热内卢成为拉丁美洲人工智能的前沿。【原文：Brazil’s biggest utility is exploring options to guarantee the power supply for a $50 billion data center project aimed at putting Rio de Janeiro at the forefront of artificial intelligence in Latin America.】

item.title: 富国银行聘请 Jackie Krese 担任基金融资银团业务主管
item.description: 据一位知情人士透露，富国银行已聘请 Jackie Krese 担任基金融资部常务董事兼全球银团业务主管。【原文：Wells Fargo has hired Jackie Krese as a managing director and global head of syndications within its fund finance group, according to a person with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 蓝猫头鹰为数据中心专项基金融资 17 亿美元
item.description: 在收购数据中心专业公司 IPI Partners 约一年后，蓝猫资本公司（Blue Owl Capital Inc.【原文：Blue Owl Capital Inc. raised $1.7 billion for its latest digital infrastructure fund, about a year after the firm acquired data center specialist IPI Partners.】

item.title: Esentia 认为墨西哥的数据中心将推动对管道的需求
item.description: 墨西哥 Esentia 能源开发公司希望数据中心的蓬勃发展能促进其管道业务的发展，因为墨西哥正在努力建设能源和人工智能基础设施，以便与该地区的同行竞争。【原文：Mexico’s Esentia Energy Development expects a boom in data centers to bolster its pipeline business, as the country races to build out energy and AI infrastructure to compete with its regional peers.】

item.title: 捷克亿万富翁将公司托管以重返总理岗位
item.description: 捷克亿万富翁安德烈-巴比斯（Andrej Babis）表示，他将把自己的企业集团 Agrofert 托管给一个盲目的信托机构，以避免下周重返总理岗位时出现利益冲突。【原文：Czech billionaire Andrej Babis said he will place his conglomerate Agrofert into a blind trust to avoid conflict-of-interest claims when he returns as premier next week.】
